description:
When migration is being reverted on a host, the default disk_bus setting are lost .

finish_revert_migration() should use image_meta, if it exist, when constructing
the disk_info.
title: libvirt: Custom disk_bus setting is being lost when migration is reverted

comments.content:
When migration is being reverted on a host, the default disk_bus setting are lost .

finish_revert_migration() should use image_meta, if it exist, when constructing
the disk_info.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vladik-romanovsky

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/132913
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/132913
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=c039eb0326690ea45e3770d00b1d397a49a49662
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit c039eb0326690ea45e3770d00b1d397a49a49662
Author: Vladik Romanovsky <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Nov 5 12:59:25 2014 -0500

    libvirt: disk_bus setting is being lost when migration is reverted
    
    finish_revert_migration() should use image_meta, if it exist,
    when constructing the disk_info.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1389850
    Change-Id: Ia373771eaaad4154a2aa0695bf3878713a68dd9f
